column4: if grub is set up to make windows the default OS, are kernel updates going to make ubuntu the default again?
kernel updates will ask before replacing any user-modified files ... so if you changed your grub files to make windows boot first, nothing will replace that without asking
will the new kernel replace the old one if you do not update grub.conf?
depends what file you edited ... the correct way to update that file in grub2 is to modify the files /etc/default/grub and then run grub-mkconfig
